trans-unit.source: Defines identifiers that represent categories of user preferences.
trans-unit.target: 定义表示用户首选项类别的标识符。

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.Win32.UserPreferenceCategory> provides identifiers that can represent a category of user preferences.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Win32.UserPreferenceCategory> 提供可以表示的用户首选项的类别的标识符。

trans-unit.source: Some of the user preferences in these categories can be changed using the Windows Control Panel, the Computer Management console, or programatically using an appropriate API.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Windows 控制面板中，计算机管理控制台中，或以编程方式使用合适的 API，可以更改某些这些类别中的用户首选项。

trans-unit.source: Indicates user preferences associated with accessibility features of the system for users with disabilities.
trans-unit.target: 指示与供残障人士使用的系统辅助功能关联的用户首选项。

trans-unit.source: Indicates user preferences associated with system colors.
trans-unit.target: 指示与系统颜色关联的用户首选项。

trans-unit.source: This category includes such as the default color of windows or menus.
trans-unit.target: 此类别包括像窗口或菜单的默认颜色这样的选项。

trans-unit.source: Indicates user preferences associated with the system desktop.
trans-unit.target: 指示与系统桌面关联的用户首选项。

trans-unit.source: This category includes the background image or background image layout of the desktop.
trans-unit.target: 此类别包括桌面的背景图像或背景图像布局。

trans-unit.source: Indicates user preferences that are not associated with any other category.
trans-unit.target: 指示不与任何其他类别关联的用户首选项。

trans-unit.source: Indicates user preferences for icon settings, including icon height and spacing.
trans-unit.target: 指示图标设置的用户首选项，包括图标高度和图标间距。

trans-unit.source: Indicates user preferences for keyboard settings, such as the key down repeat rate and delay.
trans-unit.target: 指示键盘设置的用户首选项，例如，按下键的重复速率和延迟时间。

trans-unit.source: Indicates changes in user preferences for regional settings, such as the character encoding and culture strings.
trans-unit.target: 指示对于区域设置（如字符编码和区域性字符串）的用户首选项更改。

trans-unit.source: Indicates user preferences for menu settings, such as menu delays and text alignment.
trans-unit.target: 指示菜单设置的用户首选项，例如，菜单延迟和文本对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: Indicates user preferences for mouse settings, such as double-click time and mouse sensitivity.
trans-unit.target: 指示鼠标设置的用户首选项，例如，双击时间和鼠标灵敏度。

trans-unit.source: Indicates user preferences for policy settings, such as user rights and access levels.
trans-unit.target: 指示策略设置的用户首选项，例如，用户权限和访问级别。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the user preferences for system power settings.
trans-unit.target: 指示系统电源设置的用户首选项。

trans-unit.source: This category includes power feature settings, such as the idle time before the system automatically enters low power mode.
trans-unit.target: 此类别包括电源功能设置，例如，系统自动进入低能模式之前的空闲时间。

trans-unit.source: Indicates user preferences associated with the screensaver.
trans-unit.target: 指示与屏幕保护程序关联的用户首选项。

trans-unit.source: Indicates user preferences associated with visual styles, such as enabling or disabling visual styles and switching from one visual style to another.
trans-unit.target: 指示与视觉样式关联的用户首选项，例如，启用或禁用视觉样式，以及从一种视觉样式切换到另一种视觉样式。

trans-unit.source: Indicates user preferences associated with the dimensions and characteristics of windows on the system.
trans-unit.target: 指示与系统窗口的尺寸和特性关联的用户首选项。
